src:
[포토] 푸에르토리코 응원하는 관중
02 Nov 2019, 08:46 by 스포츠조선=정재근 기자
입력 2019.11.02 17:46


2019 WBSC 프리미어 12 대한민국과 푸에르토리코의 평가전이 2일 오후 서울 고척스카이돔에서 열렸다. 푸에르토리코를 응원하는 관중이 국기를 들고 열띤 응원전을 펼치고 있다. 고척=정재근 기자 cjg@sportschosun.com/2019.11.02/

2019 WBSC 프리미어 12 대한민국과 푸에르토리코의 평가전이 2일 오후 서울 고척스카이돔에서 열렸다. 푸에르토리코를 응원하는 관중이 국기를 들고 열띤 응원전을 펼치고 있다. 고척=정재근 기자 cjg@sportschosun.com/2019.11.02/ ▲ 명품 골프 풀세트' 65% 단독 할인 '10세트'한정 45만원! 판매▲ 나르샤 “진짜 젖만 안 물렸지…” 발언에 가인 당황 ‘폭소’▲ 배우→무속인 정호근 수입 공개 “하루 5명, 복비 최저 5만원”▲ 선우은숙 “이혼 전, 이영하 팬티에 립스틱 묻은 자국 발견” 깜짝▲ 태진아, 강남에 “3000평 땅 선물…이상화 스케이트장 세우자”좋아요 0 Copyrights ⓒ 스포츠조선. 무단 전재 및 재배포 금지
text:
Three road crashes occurred in Brest-Litovsk highway in Kiev, two drivers disappeared
On Saturday, November 2, three road crashes occurred in Kiev on the Brest-Litovsk highway with the participation of six cars.

02 Nov 2019, 08:47

According to the Informant, accidents happened between 1:30 and 2:00. According to the participant of one of the road accident, on the highway towards the center of Kiev was moving Mercedes Viano, and behind it at high speed Mercedes W220. The latter began to bring in, and he crashed into the first car and then into the chipper.
A few minutes later, under unknown circumstances, BMW collided with Renault in the gap between the W220 and Viano.
A little later, Volkswagen and another Renault clashed. In this accident, the car was slightly damaged.



Upon arrival of militiamen and doctors it became clear that the drivers of Mercedes W220 and BMW left the scene of the incident unnoticed. They were searched in an ambulance, which left to assist the victims.
The location of the owners of the above cars is unknown at this time.
Details of all accidents are clarified.
